mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (email, nickname, password, profile_url, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, role) VALUES (#{email}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{profileUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedAt, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM members WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM members WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS result FROM members WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
